CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Four model compounds , ( BDTT - DPP ) 3 , (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) , (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) , and ( BDTT - TPD ) 3 were used and calculated for comparison.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. BDTT
2. DPP
3. TPD
4. (BDTT-DPP)
5. (BDTT-TPD)
6. (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)
7. (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)
8. (BDTT-TPD)3
9. (BDTT-DPP)3

Note that some of these entities are chemical compounds, while others are simply abbreviations or shortened names for the compounds.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Name in the given paragraph:

1. BDTT
2. DPP
3. TPD

These are the three material names mentioned in the paragraph. The other entities mentioned, such as (BDTT-DPP), (BDTT-TPD), and (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP), are combinations of the material names and do not refer to separate material entities.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities in the "Material Name" column:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BDTT |
| DPP |
| TPD |

These are the three material names mentioned in the paragraph, presented in the same words as in the original text.
